author: Shomik Sen Bhattacharjee
title: Facebook Comes Up With New Tools To Help Researchers With Data To Fight Coronavirus - Mashable India
description: Facebook Comes Up With New Tools To Help Researchers With Data To Fight Coronavirus Mashable India Facebook asks for users' data to generate COVID-19 'heat maps' Livemint Facebook Draws on User Data to Help Battle Coronavirus Gadgets 360 Facebook asks US user…
content:
Facebook, joining Google, said it will start providing anonymous location data about users' and relationships to help researchers better anticipate where the coronavirus might spread.
According to a post by the Facebook head of health KX Jin and Laura McGorm… [+2370 chars]
